resource.chars:
direction of the current being from the 
mantle through the heart towards the body in <u>Orbicula <\u>
& from the mantle through the <s>heart <\s> body 
towards the heart in <u>Terebratula <\u>.
The possibilities of Nature are so various 
that I would not venture, without having 
carefully dissected Orbicula - no opportunity 
of doing which has yet presented itself -
to call this view in question, but I confess 
it seems to me somewhat improbable -
[text?]
